name: Solar
description:
Delve into a short interactive course on digital circuitry while uncovering remnants of a long forgotten journal.

Use basic building blocks such as logical gates and routing blocks to construct digital circuits to solve each increasingly difficult of 9 levels.

Recommended for people interested in digital circuitry and boolean logic - engineering students, enthusiasts and geeks alike.

Features:

  • 9 increasingly challenging boolean puzzles
  • Tutorial explaining basics of digital logic
  • Logical gates with real-life equivalents
  • Story between levels

Note: Linux version is currently experimental and might not work as intended.
